sentences.sentence: The findings come from 11 years of observations at the W. M. Keck Observatory in Hawaii.
sentences.translation: 位于夏威夷的W·M·凯克天文台（W. M. Keck Observatory）在进行了11年的观测以后，终于发现了这颗行星。

sentences.sentence: But a team of researchers at Hawaii's Keck observatory cast their eyes on stars similar to our sun.
sentences.translation: 但夏威夷的凯克天文台的一个研究小队却将他们的目光投在了类似太阳的恒星上。

sentences.sentence: Until the 10-meter Keck 1 was built in 1993, the Hale telescope had the best resolving power in the world.
sentences.translation: 在1993年10米的凯克望远镜建成之前，海耳望远镜一直是世界上分辨能力最强的望远镜。
